get.summary: Get expired (but valid) token from header and refresh...

TxTarget.description:
Represents a target amount of energy, estimated range, state of charge, money etc.
to aim to add during or to limit a charging session.

TxTimingRule.description: Represents a rule to restrict the timing of a scheduled charging session

CustomJwtBearer.description: Please insert JWT token into field
